title: Circulation and the human body. -- Rev. ed.
brief_description: Uses animation to explain the needs of the body’s cells and how some of these needs are serviced by the circulation system. It details how blood returns from the capillaries to the heart through the venous system, and how the chambers of the heart pump the blood through the pulmonary circulation, then back through the arterial system to the capillaries.
